ANTsRNet 1.0
  • Reference

Creates an interpolating (or resizing) lambda layer

ResizeTensorLayer.Rd

Creates a lambda layer which interpolates/resizes an input tensor based on the specified shape

ResizeTensorLayer(shape, interpolationType = "nearestNeighbor")

Arguments

shape

vector or list of length 2 or 3 specifying the shape of the output tensor
interpolationType

type of interpolation for resampling. Can be nearestNeighbor, linear, or cubic.

Value

a keras lambda layer

Examples


library( keras )

K <- keras::backend()

inputTensor <- K$ones( c( 10L, 10L, 3L ) )

interpolatorLayer <- ResizeTensorLayer( c( 15L, 15L ) )
outputTensor <- inputTensor %>% interpolatorLayer
